Rule: If remaining in 'Blue-Collar,' ensure a higher education level (e.g., 'Masters')
Increase weekly work hours (e.g., from 40 to 45 hours)
Being self-employed can lead to higher income compared to being employed in the private sector
A change in marital status (from Separated to Divorced) can lead to higher income
